db:abstract.db:para: The Qt XML module provides C++ implementations of the SAX and DOM standards for XML.

db:article.db:para: The module is not actively maintained anymore. Please use the QXmlStreamReader and QXmlStreamWriter classes in Qt Core instead.
To include the definitions of the module's classes, use the following directive:
To link against the module, add this line to your qmake .pro file:
The Qt XML C++ Classes page gives an overview over the available classes int this module.
